n2o:sql.n2o:items-query: select :select from services_template_prescription stp where :where order by :order
n2o:sql.n2o:count-query: select count(stp) from services_template_prescription stp where :where

field.name: Наименование
field.expression: ( select array_to_string(array_agg(name_hold), ' + ') from ( select h.name || coalesce(', ' || ft.short_name, '') || coalesce(', ' || stph.hold_con_value || coalesce(' ' || (select name from cmn_measure where id = stph.hold_con_measure_id),''), '') || coalesce(', ' || trim(to_char(stph.hold_dose_value::numeric, 'FM9999990.999'), '.') || coalesce(' ' || (select name from cmn_measure where id = stph.hold_dose_measure_id),''), '') || coalesce(', ' || mnei.name, '') as name_hold from services_template_prescription stpp inner join services_template_prescription_holding stph on stph.prescription_id = stpp.id inner join inventory.holding h on h.id = stph.holding_id left join cmn_measure mnei on mnei.id = stph.hold_mnei_id left join inventory.form_type ft on ft.id = stph.hold_form_type_id where stpp.id = stp.id order by stph.id ) hold )

field.name: Доза
field.expression: ( select array_to_string(array_agg(dose), ' + ') from ( select trim(to_char(sum(hold_dose_value * count), 'FM9999990.999'), '.') || ' ' || (select name from cmn_measure where id = hold_dose_measure_id) as dose from services_template_prescription_holding where prescription_id = stp.id group by hold_dose_measure_id, id order by id ) doses )

field.name: Способ введения
field.expression: (select full_name from md_administration_route where id = stp.administration_route_id)

field.name: Периодичность
field.expression: (select name from hospital.prescription_periodicity where id = stp.periodicity_id)

field.name: Условия
field.expression: (select name from md_visit_term where id = stp.visit_term_id)

field.name: Кол-во
field.expression: (select count from services_template_prescription_holding where prescription_id = stp.id limit 1)

field.name: Доза
field.expression: (select hold_dose_value from services_template_prescription_holding where prescription_id = stp.id limit 1)

field.name: Ед. изм.
field.expression: (select cm.name from services_template_prescription_holding ph join public.cmn_measure cm on ph.hold_dose_measure_id = cm.id where ph.prescription_id = stp.id limit 1)

field.name: Ед. изм.
field.expression: (select cm.name from services_template_prescription_holding ph join public.cmn_measure cm on ph.hold_mnei_id = cm.id where ph.prescription_id = stp.id limit 1)
